entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 8:36 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 24. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 8:36 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then rain. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the evening then becoming light before morning. Low 6. Forecast issued 8:36 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
